name: Dead Mist: Last Stand
detailed_description:
First Person Shooter survival horror game, based in enemies waves.
Killing enemies will give you points that you can use to buy more ammo, weapons, rebuild barriers and heatlh and give you more chances to survive the attacks
Features:
-20 different zombies.
-First Person perspective.
-4 different Weapons.
-More inclined to survival horror than Action.

You play as a Soldier who have to protect the Camp form Hordes of Undeads.
You will have to face Fast ones that are deadly agile and slow ones that can get you and are stronger.
How to win the game? shoot them in the Head.

short_description:
The plague have become people into monsters. Fight them and continue your journey to survive.
Each night can be your last

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP2
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: cualquieraAAA MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities
